cncShop.blueInfo: Whether it’s anti-ageing, blemished skin, couperose, pigmentation, dryness or sensitivity — find targeted skincare solutions tailored to you.
cncShop.description: An exclusive selection of professional cosmetic products from the CNC brand — developed for all skin types and every skin need.
cncShop.title: CNC DIRECT SHOP
gallery.title: Gallery
greeting.paragraph1: In a serene, stylish setting, I take the time to understand your wishes and needs in order to provide you with personalized treatments of the highest standard. Whether it’s facial treatments, eyelash extensions, or lash and brow lifting, every procedure is carried out with utmost care, sensitivity, and adherence to the strictest hygiene and quality standards.
greeting.paragraph2: Treat yourself to a restorative break from everyday life and experience visible results along with a fresh, well-groomed appearance. I am very much looking forward to meeting you in person and providing you with a pleasant, feel-good experience at Leonti Aesthetic.
greeting.subtitle: Welcome to Leonti Aesthetic - your place for natural beauty and stylish care.
greeting.title: Crafting Confidence
help.description: Give us call or send us a message and one of our friendly team members will be in touch shortly.
help.subtitle: We’re here to help
help.title: Get in touch
location.subtitle: We’re just a few clicks away
location.title: Come Visit Us
mainFoto: studio owner in the foreground with her arms crossed
mainServicesPage.aquafacial.description: The AquaFacial treatment by Cure-Concept offers a gentle, non-invasive way to deeply cleanse and hydrate your skin. Using advanced aqua dermabrasion, vacuum technology, and nutrient-rich serums, it removes dead skin cells, oil, and impurities without irritation—perfect for all skin types.
mainServicesPage.aquafacial.list.1: Suitable for dry, oily, sensitive, or acne-prone skin.
mainServicesPage.aquafacial.name: Aquafacial
mainServicesPage.aquafacial.steps.2: Mild acid peel to renew skin
mainServicesPage.description: At Leonti Aesthetic, we offer personalized beauty treatments focused on enhancing your natural glow. Using high-quality products and state-of-the-art techniques, every service is tailored to your skin and style needs.
mainServicesPage.discover: Discover what we can do for you:
mainServicesPage.eyebrowLifting.descript: Enhance your natural beauty with lash styles ranging from subtle to bold — no mascara needed. We use top-quality materials and precision techniques to deliver the look that suits you best:
mainServicesPage.eyebrowLifting.name: Eyebrow Lifting
mainServicesPage.eyelashExtensions.choos: Choose your style We’ll take care of the rest
mainServicesPage.eyelashExtensions.descr: Enhance your natural beauty with lash styles ranging from subtle to bold — no mascara needed. We use top-quality materials and precision techniques to deliver the look that suits you best:
mainServicesPage.eyelashExtensions.name: Eyelash Extensions
mainServicesPage.eyelashExtensions.treat: Elegant and natural for everyday wear
Fuller lashes with a soft, fluffy finish
Dramatic volume for a bold look
mainServicesPage.eyelashLifting.descript: Get fuller, more defined brows without the daily effort. Your eyebrows are shaped, strengthened, and fixed for a clean, even look that stays in place.
mainServicesPage.eyelashLifting.name: Eyelash Lifting
mainServicesPage.eyelashLifting.result: Result: A natural curl that lasts up to 6 weeks.
mainServicesPage.microneedling.descripti: Microneedling stimulates your skin’s natural regeneration using ultra-fine needles or nanotips that activate collagen, elastin, and hyaluronic acid production. Ideal for:
mainServicesPage.microneedling.name: Microneedling
mainServicesPage.microneedling.name.rosa: Naturally beautiful skin through targeted deep care
mainServicesPage.microneedling.treatment: At Leonti Aesthetic, we offer three levels of Microneedling, tailored to your skin’s needs:
Classic & effective — targets pores, wrinkles, and scars.
Intensive & deeply active — for powerful anti-aging and skin renewal.
Gentle & superficial — perfect for a natural glow.
mainServicesPage.principalImg.alt: decorative close-up of a woman's eye area
mainServicesPage.pureGlow.description: A gentle yet effective treatment that deeply cleanses the skin. Using high-quality CNC products, enzymatic peeling, a skin scrubber, and a soothing mask, your skin will be refreshed and soothed. Includes a relaxing facial massage upon request.
mainServicesPage.pureGlow.name: Classic Facial Cleaning
mainServicesPage.pureGlow.result: Result: A clear, radiant, and healthy-looking complexion.
mainServicesPage.pureGlow.subservice.bas: A clear, refreshing facial treatment for well-groomed skin in everyday life. With a gentle peel and the Skin Scrubber, impurities are gently removed, the skin is deeply cleansed, and it is provided with moisture—perfect for regular, straightforward skincare.
mainServicesPage.pureGlow.subservice.int: A deep-acting facial cleansing with enzymatic peel and the Skin Scrubber, combined with a nourishing active ingredient ampoule, a relaxing face and décolleté massage, and calming light therapy. Ideal for those who want visible results and a moment of relaxation.
mainServicesPage.subtitle: Our Services
mainServicesPage.title: Leonti Aesthetic
